summary: This document is a forwarded email chain from February 2021 regarding a Facebook legal case (#4081582). Facebook's Law Enforcement Response Team informs a recipient (likely a US Attorney's Office) that a non-disclosure order related to an account under the username 'ghislainemaxwell' has expired and they will notify the account holder unless a new order is provided within 30 days.

persons.name: Ghislaine Maxwell
persons.role: Facebook account holder subject to legal process
persons.context: Her Facebook account, under the username 'ghislainemaxwell', is the subject of the expired non-disclosure order mentioned in the email from Facebook's Law Enforcement Response Team.

events.title: Facebook notifies of expiring non-disclosure order
events.description: Facebook's Law Enforcement Response Team sends an email stating that a non-disclosure order related to case #4081582 (involving the account 'ghislainemaxwell') has expired. They will notify the account holder unless a new order is received within 30 days.

keyFacts: Facebook held a non-disclosure order related to legal process for the account 'ghislainemaxwell'.
That non-disclosure order expired, and Facebook planned to notify the account holder (Ghislaine Maxwell) unless a new order was provided.
The communication indicates ongoing or recent legal investigations involving Ghislaine Maxwell's social media accounts as of early 2021.
